name: Red Metal Barrel
description: Decorative red metal barrel.

name: Blue Metal Barrel
description: Decorative blue metal barrel.

name: Green Metal Barrel
description: Decorative green metal barrel.

name: Wooden Barrel
description: Wooden barrel for storing items.

name: Alarm Bell
description:
Bell that sets the alert status for Pals on base.
Change Pal behavior to either attack invading enemies, or focus entirely on work
whenever you like.

name: Monitoring Stand
description:
You can command your Pals to work on various things inside a base.
Try not to overwork them!

name: Antique Bathtub
description: Decorative antique bathtub.

name: Wooden Bench
description: Decorative wooden bench.

name: Primitive Furnace
description:
Allows refinement of CopperIngot.
The quality leaves much to desire, and processing is slow.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

name: Improved Furnace
description:
Allows refinement of IronIngot.
The quality has improved, but the processing speed is still unsatisfactory.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

name: Electric Furnace
description:
Allows refinement of StealIngot.
It requires electricity to use, but is quicker to process.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

name: en Text
description: en Text

name: en Text
description: en Text

name: Small Container
description: Small container for storing items.

name: Antique Braided Basket
description: Decorative antique braided basket.

name: Cloth Covered Container
description: Cloth covered container for storing items.

name: Wooden Box
description: Wooden box for storing items.

name: Breeding Farm
description:
Assign one male and one female Pal to produce eggs.
Placing Cake in the facility is required for production.

name: Statue of Power
description:
Stone statue spoken of in legends on Palpagos Island.
Offer up Relic
to receive strange powers.

name: Cable Reel
description: Decorative cable reel.

name: Campfire
description:
Needed for cooking food.
It can only be used to grill simple ingredients.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

name: Witch Cauldron
description:
Place in base to improve
medicine manufacturing speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

name: Ceiling Lamp
description:
A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night.
It can be placed on a ceiling.
Requires electricity, but lights up a larger area.

name: Leather Chair
description: Decorative leather chair.

name: Frog Chair
description: Cute decorative chair.

name: Antique Wooden Chair
description: Decorative antique wooden chair.

name: Wooden Chair
description: Decorative wooden chair.

name: Iron Chair
description: Decorative wooden chair.

name: Antique Green Wooden Chair
description: Decorative antique green wooden chair.

name: Pal Essence Condenser
description:
A chamber for increasing a Pal's rank.
Pals can surpass their physical limitations if given
a concentrated extract taken from a Pal of the same type.

name: Antique Grandfather Clock
description:
Decorative antique grandfather clock.
Broken, it doesn't tell time.

name: Wall Clock
description:
Decorative wall clock.
Broken, it doesn't tell time.

name: Large Container
description:
Large container for storing items.
Imitates the designs left behind by an ancient and prosperous civilization.

name: Cooking Pot
description:
Needed for cooking food.
Use of a cooking pot allows for a wider variety of meal preparation.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

name: Cooler
description:
A device that blows cool air, lowering the temperature of a base.
It doesn't provide much relief from the heat, but helps one to endure somewhat hot environments.
Requires an Ice Pal for cooling.

name: Cooler Box
description:
Small food vault.
Assign an Ice Pal to help prevent
food stored inside from spoiling.

name: Wooden Counter
description: Decorative wooden counter.

name: Crusher
description:
Facility for breaking down Stone and Wood to exchange them for other materials.
Requires Pal with the Watering trait to spin the water turbine.

name: Antique Curtain
description:
Decorative antique curtain.
Can be placed on walls.

name: Training Dummy
description:
Training dummy shaped like a Penguin.
Can only be placed in wide open areas.

name: Tuppanyan sticker
description: en Text

name: Mounted Crossbow
description:
Deploy a Pal to operate this defensive installation.
Requires Arrow to use.
Place ammo in the chest, and the deployed Pal will automatically load the weapon.

name: Mounted Gatling Gun
description:
A defensive installation for protecting a base from enemies.
It fires high-powered ammunition.
Deploy a Pal to it to prepare for battle.

name: Mounted Machine Gun
description:
Deploy a Pal to operate this defensive installation.
Requires RifleBullet to use.
Place ammo in the chest, and the deployed Pal will automatically load the weapon.

name: en Text
description: en Text

name: Mounted Missile Launcher
description:
Deploy a Pal to operate this defensive installation.
Requires ExplosiveBullet to use.
Place ammo in the chest, and the deployed Pal will automatically load the weapon.

name: Sandbag
description:
Defensive installation to protect a base from enemies.
Place a Pal and it will ignore other work
to stay on lookout and prepare for combat.

name: Defensive Wall
description:
Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions.
Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

name: Metal Defensive Wall
description:
Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

name: Wooden Defensive Wall
description:
Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions.
Made from wood, it breaks easily.

name: Iron Desk
description: Decorative iron desk.

name: Antique Desk
description: Decorative antique desk.

name: Viewing Cage
description:
Container for observing captured Pals.
Pals inside cannot participate in battle or production,
but they do not become hungry.

name: Electric Cooler
description:
A device that blows cool air, lowering the temperature of a base.
Using electricity, it can really lower the temperature.
Requires an Ice Pal for cooling.

name: Power Generator
description:
A Lightning Pal-powered electric generator.
Electric equipment won't run without this.

name: en Text
description: en Text

name: en Text
description: en Text

name: en Text
description: en Text

name: Electric Heater
description:
A device that blows warm air, raising the temperature of a base.
Using electricity, it can really heat things up.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

name: Electric Kitchen
description:
Needed for cooking food.
It requires electricity to run, but allows a large amount of meals to be prepared rapidly.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

name: en Text
description: en Text

name: en Text
description: en Text

name: High Quality Workbench
description:
A Factory_Hard_01 for producing items and gear.
A small workspace limits production speeds.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

name: Production Assembly Line
description:
A Factory_Hard_01 for producing items and gear.
By splitting Pals into groups, production speeds have somewhat increased.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

name: Production Assembly Line II
description:
A Factory_Hard_01 for producing items and gear.
Through clever management, production speeds have greatly increased.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

name: Berry Plantation
description:
A farm that can grow Berries.
Harvest time is quick, but eating them doesn't provide much sustenance.
Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

name: Plantation
description: en Text

name: Plantation
description: en Text

name: Plantation
description: en Text

name: Lettuce Plantation
description:
A farm that can grow Lettuce.
It takes time to harvest, but increases the variety of meals you can prepare.
Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

name: Tomato Plantation
description:
A farm that can grow Tomato.
They take time to harvest, but increase the variety of meals you can prepare.
Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

name: Wheat Plantation
description:
A farm that can grow Wheat.
It requires an average amount of time to harvest.
Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest crops.

name: Great Eagle Statue
description:
A stone monument in the shape of a ChickenPal.
Allows fast travel to the location where it is placed.

name: Mill
description:
Facility for milling Wheat to produce Flour.
Requires Pal with the Watering trait to spin the water turbine.

name: Flower Bed
description:
Place in base to improve
gathering speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

name: Water Fountain
description:
Place in base to improve
watering speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

name: Garbage Bag
description: Decorative garbage bag.

name: Antique Globe
description: Decorative antique globe.

name: Soccer Goal
description:
Decorative soccer goal.
Kicking a SheepBall into it will get you no points.

name: Egg Incubator
description:
Used for incubating a PalEgg.
If a PalEgg is left in it, it will automatically hatch after some time has passed.

name: Heater
description:
A device that blows warm air, raising the temperature of a base.
It doesn't provide much warmth, but helps one to endure somewhat cold environments.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

name: en Text
description: en Text

name: Wooden Chest
description:
Stores items.
Made of wood, it is easy to break.
It's probably not the best thing to store valuables in.

name: Metal Chest
description:
Stores items.
Reinforced with metal, it is somewhat durable.
The increased size allows for the storage of more things.

name: Refined Metal Chest
description:
Stores items.
Made of iron, it is extremely durable.
It is useful as a large, secure storage box.

name: Big Wall Ivy
description:
Decorative large ivy.
Can be placed on a wall.

name: Small Wall Ivy
description:
Decorative small ivy.
Can be placed on a wall.

name: Horizontal Wall Ivy
description:
Decorative horizontal ivy.
Can be placed on a wall.

name: Lamp
description:
A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night.
Requires electricity, but lights up a larger area.

name: Large Ceiling Lamp
description:
A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night.
It can be placed on a ceiling.
Requires a significant amount of electricity, but lights up an even larger area.

name: Large Mounted Lamp
description:
A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night.
Requires a significant amount of electricity, but lights up an even larger area.

name: Chandelier
description:
Chandelier that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

name: Wall Lamp
description:
Wall lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

name: Brick Fireplace
description:
Brick fireplace that provides illumination.
Must be lit with fire from a Fire Pal.

name: Fireplace
description:
Fireplace that provides illumination.
Must be lit with fire from a Fire Pal.

name: Antique Brown Floor Lamp
description:
Antique brown floor lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

name: Antique Red Floor Lamp
description:
Antique red floor lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

name: Simple Street Lamp
description:
Simple street lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

name: Double Street Lamp
description:
Double street lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

name: Retro Street Lamp
description:
Retro street lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

name: Stylish Street Lamp
description:
Stylish street lamp that provides illumination.
Requires electricity to light.

name: Claw Crane
description:
Decorative claw crane.
Broken, it can't be played.

name: Cola Vending Machine
description:
Decorative cola vending machine.
Cannot be used to buy items.

name: en Text
description: en Text

name: Straw Pal Bed
description:
A straw bed for Pals.
Pals can rest on it when injured, or to sleep at night.
It isn't soft, but it's better than nothing.

name: Fluffy Pal Bed
description:
A fluffy bed that Pals can get a good rest on.
Pals can rest on it when injured, or to sleep at night.
Pals love sleeping on fluffy beds like this.

name: Large Pal Bed
description:
Fluffy bed to give Pals a good rest.
Pals can rest when injured or sleep at night.
Even large Pals can sleep soundly on a bed like this.

name: Medieval Medicine Workbench
description:
A facility for making Pal medicine.
It can only produce simple medicines.
Leave its operation to a Pal that can make medicine.

name: Electric Medicine Workbench
description:
A facility for making Pal medicine.
It requires electricity, but can produce high quality medicine.
Leave its operation to a Pal that can make medicine.

name: en Text
description: en Text

name: Metal Door
description:
Door built on a foundation. Becomes an entrance.
Made of metal, it is extremely durable.

name: Iron Gate
description:
Gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.
Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

name: Metal Slanted Roof
description:
Slanted roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind.
Made of metal, it is extremely durable.

name: Metal Triangular Wall
description:
Triangular wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders.
Made of metal, it is extremely durable.

name: Metal Wall and Window
description:
Wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. Includes a window.
Made of metal, it is extremely durable.

name: Metal Foundation
description:
A foundation for building walls or facilities on.
Made of metal, it is extremely durable.

name: Metal Roof
description:
A roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind.
Made of metal, it is extremely durable.

name: Metal Stairs
description:
Stairs placed below a foundation or roof for climbing up.
Made of metal, they are extremely durable.

name: Metal Wall
description:
Walls built on foundations for keeping out intruders.
Made of metal, they are extremely durable.

name: Pickaxe and Helmet
description:
Place in base to improve
mining speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

name: Antique Oval Mirror
description: Decorative antique oval mirror.

name: Antique Wall Mirror
description:
Decorative antique wall mirror.
Can be placed on walls.

name: Antique Mirror
description: Decorative antique mirror.

name: Ranch
description:
Farm for raising sheep and fowl-like Pals.
Assign a Pal with the appropriate Partner Skill to a farm
to produce items.

name: Flame Cauldron
description:
Place in base to improve
fire-making speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

name: Palbox
description:
Facility for storing captured Pals.
Pals inside gradually recover HP.
Area around this facility becomes a base.

name: Feed Box
description:
A box for storing Pal food.
Pals can feed from it when hungry.
Make sure to keep it well-stocked to keep your Pals happy.

name: Antique Partition
description: Decorative antique partition.

name: Grand Piano
description:
Decorative grand piano.
Cannot be played.

name: Upright Piano
description:
Decorative upright piano.
Cannot be played.

name: Earthen Pipe
description: Decorative earthen pipe.

name: Houseplant
description: Decorative houseplant.

name: Houseplant and Chair
description: Decorative houseplant and chair.

name: Tabletop Houseplant
description: Decorative tabletop houseplant.

name: Potted Houseplant
description: Decorative potted houseplant.

name: Human Bed
description: en Text

name: Shoddy Bed
description:
A shoddy bed for humans.
Use it when injured or to sleep at night.
You won't be able to sleep soundly without a roof over your head.

name: Fine Bed
description:
A fluffy bed for humans.
Use it when injured or to sleep at night.
You won't be able to sleep soundly without a roof over your head.

name: en Text
description:
Used for recovering a Pal's HP.
Soothes and calms a Pal inside their sphere using Paldium.

name: Refrigerator
description:
Large food vault.
Assign an Ice Pal to help prevent
food stored inside from spoiling.

name: Repair Bench
description:
Workbench for repairing broken tools.
Materials are needed to make repairs.

name: Antique Carpet
description: Decorative antique carpet.

description: Decorative antique red carpet.

description: Long iron shelf for storing items.

Orange locker for storing items.

Antique chest for storing items.

Decorative wooden shelf.

description:
Decorative emergency exit sign.
Can be placed on ceilings.

name: Emergency Exit Wall Sign
description:
Decorative emergency exit sign.
Can be placed on walls.

name: Sign
description:
Can be written on.
Use for memos or to communicate with others.

name: Silo
description:
Place in base to improve
planting speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

name: Snowman
description:
Place in base to improve
cooling speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

name: Leather Armchair
description: Decorative leather armchair.

name: Antique Armchair
description: Decorative antique armchair.

name: Leather Couch
description: Decorative leather couch.

name: Antique Couch
description: Decorative antique couch.

name: Antique Ottoman
description: Decorative antique ottoman.

name: Hot Spring
description:
Facility where Pals on base can rest.
Restores SAN after a long day of hard work.

name: High Quality Hot Spring
description:
Facility where Pals on base can rest.
Now comfier and restores more SAN.

name: Sphere Workbench
description:
An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals.
A small workspace keeps the production speed slow.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

name: Sphere Assembly Line
description:
An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals.
By splitting Pals into groups, production speeds have somewhat increased.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

name: Sphere Assembly Line II
description:
An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals.
Through clever management, production speeds have greatly increased.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

name: Superior Sphere Factory
description: en Text

name: Superior Sphere Factory

name: Logging Site
description:
A facility for producing Wood.
Cutting wood is hard work that requires much physical endurance.
Leave it to Pals skilled in logging.

name: Stone Pit
description:
A facility for producing Stone.
Mining Stone is hard work that requires much physical endurance.
Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Left behind by an ancient civilization,
now it only shows images of Pengullet.

Decorative antique toilet.
Cannot be used for its original purpose.

handwork speed.

name: No Pals Beyond Sign
description:
Decorative No Pals Beyond sign.
Used in ancient times, it now serves no real purpose.

name: Stop Sign
description:
Decorative Stop sign.
Used in ancient times, it now serves no real purpose.

name: Beware of Eikthyrdeer Sign
description:
Decorative Beware of Eikthyrdeer sign.
In ancient times, collisions between Eikthyrdeer and other Pals were frequent.

name: Beware of Mammorest Sign
description:
Decorative Beware of Mammorest sign.
In ancient times, those who angered a Mammorest were often killed.

name: Electric Pylon
description:
Place in base to improve
electricity generating speed.
Placing more than one has no additional effect.

name: Bear Trap (Small)
description: Trap that immobilizes Pals who step on it. The capture rate with the sphere increases when a Pal is trapped. Only effective on small Pals.

name: Bear Trap (Large)
description: A bear trap to immobilize large Pals. The capture rate with the sphere increases when a Pal is trapped. Only effective on large Pals, small Pals will not be caught.

name: Mine
description: Trap that explodes when a Pal steps on it. It deals damage to a wide area.

name: Electric Mine
description: Trap that electrocutes the Pal that steps on it. The electrocuted Pal has a higher capture rate with the sphere.

name: Ice Mine
description: Trap that freezes the Pal that steps on it. The frozen Pal has a higher capture rate with the sphere.

name: Moving panels
description: A description of the moving panel

name: Hanging Trap
description:
Trap that catches Pals passing through it.
Pals caught in the trap are easier to catch with Spheres.
Only effective on small Pals.

name: Wall Torch
description:
A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night.
It can be placed on walls.
Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

description:
An Assembly Line for producing weapons and ammunition.
A small workspace prevents the production of high quality weapons.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

description:
An Assembly Line for producing weapons and ammunition.
Dividing up work has allowed for the production of somewhat decent armaments.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

name: Weapon Assembly Line II
description:
An Assembly Line for producing weapons and ammunition.
Cleverly dividing up work has allowed for production of top-class weapons.
Requires Pals that can work with their hands.
